title: The Snowy day
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Mal Wittman and Morton Schindel
brief_description: The silent wonder of city snow and Peter’s delight in it as he slides down snow mountains and takes a snowball home in his pocket are told in exquisite collages that reflect the sparkling quality of snow and the contrasting warmth of the home and family. Narrated by Jane Harvey.
